title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Ecological Dynamics of Sports Performance: Environment-Coordinated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interaction between individuals and environments in sports performance settings to explain adaptive coordination strategies
Learners can identify three or more "affordances" applicable in actual game scenarios by applying ecological dynamics principles
Learners can develop and evaluate the effectiveness of sports practice tasks designed from an ecological perspective through team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
